attributes.value:
Use a box grater to manually grate the cucumbers or you can use a small food processor to finely chop the cucumber. Toss the grated cucumbers with ½ teaspoon kosher salt. Spoon the grated cucumber into a cheese cloth or a double thickness napkin and squeeze dry.
In one large mixing bowl, place the garlic with remaining ½ teaspoon salt, white vinegar, and extra virgin olive oil. Mix to combine.
Add the grated cucumber to the bowl with the garlic mixture. Stir in the yogurt, and a pinch of white or black pepper, and the fresh herbs. Stir to combine well.
Cover and refrigerate for a bit (30 minutes to a couple hours before serving).

Stir the tzatziki sauce to refresh and transfer to serving bowl, drizzle with more extra virgin olive oil. Serve with your favorite sides.
